Package ooga.model.engine.running

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
ooga.model.engine.running.Engine
ooga.model.engine.running.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends Engine
This is the engine used for running a game. It extends the regular engine. The engine takes care of the logic of switching turns and making appropriate method calls to the board This class is dependant on the FrontEndExternalAPI, Coordinate, GameBoard, GameRules, Player, and AI classes Example Code: DummyViewController viewController = new DummyViewController(); Engine gameEngine = new GameEngine(viewController) gameEngine.setGameType("chess"); gameEngine.setBoard(new GameBoard(8,8)); gameEngine.runTurn(1,0); gameEngine.runTurn(2,2);
